definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The five-strong panel was approved by the European Union to mediate in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 五強小組批准了歐洲聯盟在利比亞進行調解。

sentences.english: The European Union needs to reduce barriers to market access.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲聯盟必須減少市場準入方面的壁壘。

sentences.english: President of Asian Region of European Union , Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 一九九二年成爲歐洲聯盟亞太區會長。

sentences.english: One, the yield that European allied Western Europe is one tradition steel area, the history is long.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲聯盟西歐是一傳統的產鋼地區，歷史悠久。

sentences.english: It has 182 Member States and one Member Organization, the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 它有182個成員國和1個成員組織，即歐洲聯盟。

sentences.english: Because of this unique structure most simply classify the European Union as a sui generis (unique) entity and leave it at that.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲聯盟如此獨特的結構大多簡易的分類成特殊實體。

definition: a tax declaration form/a tax return
